TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit NativeObjectSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity
Public MustInherit Class NativeObjectSecurity Inherits CommonObjectSecurity

Docs.summary: Provides the ability to control access to native objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs). Native object types are defined by the enumeration.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected NativeObjectSecurity (bool isContainer, System.Security.AccessControl.ResourceType resourceType);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isContainer, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.ResourceType resourceType) cil managed
protected: NativeObjectSecurity(bool isContainer, System::Security::AccessControl::ResourceType resourceType);
new System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity : bool * System.Security.AccessControl.ResourceType -> System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity

Docs.param: if the new object is a container object.
The type of securable object with which the new object is associated.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values.

MemberSignature.Value: protected NativeObjectSecurity (bool isContainer, System.Security.AccessControl.ResourceType resourceType, System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle handle, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections includeSections);

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isContainer, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.ResourceType resourceType, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle handle, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections includeSections) cil managed

protected: NativeObjectSecurity(bool isContainer, System::Security::AccessControl::ResourceType resourceType, System::Runtime::InteropServices::SafeHandle ^ handle, System::Security::AccessControl::AccessControlSections includeSections);

new System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity : bool * System.Security.AccessControl.ResourceType * System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle * System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections -> System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity

Docs.param: if the new object is a container object.
The type of securable object with which the new object is associated.
The handle of the securable object with which the new object is associated.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to include in this object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values. We recommend that the values of the parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando si rende persistente un <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity> dell'oggetto, se il valore della `includeSections` parametro passato al <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> metodo non è identico al valore del `includeSections` parametro passato al costruttore utilizzato per creare il <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity> oggetto, le sezioni di persistente <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity> oggetto può contenere valori imprevisti. Se, ad esempio, un costruttore viene chiamato con un `includeSections` pari a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Access>e versioni successive un <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> metodo viene chiamato su quell'oggetto con un `includeSections` pari a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.All>, risultante persistenti <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity> oggetto conterrà valori imprevisti di regole di controllo, gruppo e proprietario.

MemberSignature.Value: protected NativeObjectSecurity (bool isContainer, System.Security.AccessControl.ResourceType resourceType, System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity.ExceptionFromErrorCode exceptionFromErrorCode, object exceptionContext);

The type of securable object with which the new object is associated.
A delegate implemented by integrators that provides custom exceptions.
An object that contains contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
